Job Description: Develop the functionalities assigned with the Works Items. Check that the work Items are up to date linked to the activity provided during the day. Update the fields Completed Work and Remaining Work . Read the content of the Work Item you will work on the next day. If you do not understand the content, contact your product manager. The development of the interface of a new dialog box must respect the standard used in the rest of the product.
